title: Workshop Shaco available again?
body:
Is it at all possible, that although it is a legacy skin they would perhaps make workshop shaco temporarily available again?
It's the only skin I really want and I couldn't afford it last time it was out :(

replies.body: Legacy skins periodically do make an appearance back in the shop. :]
Bump this....it doesn't look like it's going to be available....It's the only Shaco skin I don't have and would love to get it to complete the set!

I know this doesn't help right now, but I'm sure it will be available around December. Or you can get really lucky with Mystery Skins (I've gotten some really lucky ones of skins that I was actually trying to get)
